```{r}
library(here)
library(plyr)
library(tidyverse)
source(here::here("scripts", "scripts_functions", "plot_facet_flam.R"))
source(here::here("scripts", "scripts_functions", "figure_info_sierra_flammability.R"))
library(ggbeeswarm)
library(ggpattern)
library(kableExtra)
```


```{r}
seg_results_df <- list.files(path = here::here("processed-data", "analysis 2.0", "segmented_reg_all"),  # Identify all CSV files
                       pattern = "*.csv", full.names = TRUE) %>% 
  lapply(read_csv) %>%                              # Store all files in list
  bind_rows %>% # Combine data sets into one data set 
  mutate(significant = case_when(
    p_value <= 0.05 ~ "yes", 
    p_value > 0.05 ~ "no", 
    TRUE ~ as.character(p_value)
  ))
```

Visualize: 

```{r}
seg_results_df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = psi, 
             x = flam_metric
             )) + 
  geom_bar(position = "dodge", 
           #stat = identity,
           aes(fill = analysis)) +
  #geom_bar(position="dodge", stat="identity") +
      geom_bar_pattern(#stat = "identity",
                   pattern_color = "white",
                   pattern_fill = "black",
                   aes(pattern = significant)
                  ) + 
  facet_wrap(~water_variable, scales = "free") +
  scale_pattern_manual(values = c("stripe","none")) +
  scale_fill_discrete(
    guide = guide_legend(override.aes = list(pattern = "none")) # <- hide pattern
  )
```


```{r}
for (i in unique(seg_results_df$spp)) {

     df <- seg_results_df %>% 
    filter(spp == i)

 p <-  ggplot(df,
   aes(
            y = psi, 
             x = flam_metric, 
             fill = analysis, 
            # pattern = as.factor(significant)
             )) + 
   scale_pattern_manual(values = c("yes" = "stripe", "no" = "none", "NA" = "none")) +
  geom_bar(position="dodge", stat="identity") +
 # geom_bar_pattern(position = "dodge", 
          # stat="identity",
    #pattern = "stripe"
   # ) +
  facet_wrap(~water_variable, scales = "free") +
    labs(title = i)
 
 if (!is.null(p)) plot(p)
 
}
```
